content:
Diagnosis:		Endometrial cancer

Management:		12 Jan 2024 Total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy
			02 Feb 2024 Started adjuvant carboplatin/paclitaxel

Histology:		Grade 3 endometrioid adenocarcinoma
			Stage pT3aN0M0
			POLE wild-type, p53 normal expression pattern

Current Situation:	Pre cycle 4 carboplatin/paclitaxel

[redacted name] attended clinic today for pre-chemotherapy assessment. She is tolerating treatment well with only grade 1 fatigue and minimal neuropathy affecting fingertips. Performance status remains 0. Blood results are satisfactory for proceeding with cycle 4. CT scan performed last week shows no evidence of disease. The plan is to continue with cycle 4 today and review again in 3 weeks prior to cycle 5. She understands to contact us if any problems develop in the interim.

primary_cancer.biomarker_status: POLE wild-type, p53 normal expression pattern

cancer_timeline.value: Total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy
CT scan shows no evidence of disease

patient_facts.value: Grade 1 fatigue and minimal neuropathy affecting fingertips

status_updates.value: Stage III endometrial cancer receiving adjuvant chemotherapy. Tolerating treatment well with no evidence of disease on imaging
Grade 1 fatigue and minimal neuropathy affecting fingertips
Proceeding with cycle 4 carboplatin/paclitaxel at full dose
Review in 3 weeks prior to cycle 5
